name: Death Overture
description:
Fullscreen recommended

CONTROLS:

Keyboard

  A/D: move

  Space: jump

  Left Mouse: attack

  E: interact

  Q: ghost form

  ESC: pause menu

Gamepad

  Left Stick: move

  A (button south) jump

  X (button west): attack

  Y: (button north) interact

  B: (button east) ghost form

  Start: pause menu

A ghost ventures into the castle where he is a prisoner. Will he be able to escape after centuries of imprisonment?

This prototype was developed from May 20 to May 30 2022 for the GameDev.tv game jam. 

We are looking for your feedback and we hope to further develop this game since we believe it has potential.

The game supports both gamepad and keyboard,  but is best played by the gamepad.
